Calculate power distance

powerDistance.Rd

Calculates distances for WCNA from correlation coefficient(s) using a power function.

Usage

powerDistance(r, k, unsigned = TRUE)

Arguments

r

Correlation coefficient(s), -1 <= r <= 1.

k

The power parameter.

unsigned

If TRUE, this function computes distances based on unsigned associations (|r|), otherwise it computes distances based on signed correlations (r).

Value

A matrix of distances

Details

Correlation and distance are transformed as follows: for type = "unsigned"= 1 - abs(r)^k; for type = "signed" = ((1 - r)/2)^k
